title: Web Interface for Automation Technicians
summary: Summer Internship (2022) at Helomics, a division of Predictive Oncology
description:
I picked up full-stack development on the fly during my 12-week internship. Under the guidance of my mentor Shane Baskin, I built a web interface that allows users to
  
- run an active learning algorithm that recommends the most promising cancer cell line and drug combinations
  
- remotely execute liquid handler scripts
  
- review experiment results on interactive graphs
